com.px100systems.data.core

Class Criteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.px100systems.data.core.Criteria
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Criteria.and, Criteria.MemberCriteria, Criteria.not, Criteria.or

    public abstract class Criteria
extends java.lang.Object
    Search criteria API. Does not correlate entity fields, just compares them (lvalues) to constants.
    Supports named ":xyz" parameters - see replaceValue().

    Usage Example:
    import static com.px100systems.data.core.Criteria.*;
    Criteria criteria = and(eq("textField", "something"), or(lt("dateField", new Date()), in("intField", 1L, 2L, 3L)));

    Null handling caveats: depending on the implementation (e.g. cqengine) nulls match against gt/lt and possibly other queries. Make sure to explicitly check for not null, especially with Dates.
    Author:
    Alex Rogachevsky
